title: Tomi Ungerer: storyteller
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Gene Deitch
brief_description: An interview with Tomi Ungerer, a delightful man and gifted visual storyteller. Includes animated sequences based on three of his published illustrated books: “Moon man”, “The Three robbers” and “The Beast of M. Racine”.
